text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Amphibious/Underwater. Drags a single zombie underwater. Won't target big zombies. Useless on land.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Tangle Kelp likes to go deep, he'll go on and on about Nietzsche's "Thus Spoke Zucchini", but sometimes you just want to talk about the weather.

pages.title: 🗡 Enforce Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that nears them underwater.
